api_list.name: Extract NLU
api_list.description: Retrieve Natural Language Understanding results (NLU) within your text. Get semantic insights about your sentence or document.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://french-nlu.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_nlu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-nlu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://french-nlu.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_nlu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "french-nlu.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
